span.span: Represents a code checksum pragma code entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从 继承，并且可以包含在 中。The class inherits from and can be contained in a . 提供源文件的唯一标识，包括已生成的文件。 provides the unique identification of source files, including files that have been generated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows the use of the class. summary.span: 获取或设置 GUID，该 GUID 标识要使用的校验和算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a GUID that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

value.span: ，它标识要使用的校验和算法。

span.span: A that identifies the checksum algorithm to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 MD5 和 SHA1 哈希提供算法。Algorithms are provided for the MD5 and SHA1 hashes. 用于 MD5 哈希的 GUID 值为 {0x406ea660，0x64cf，0x4c82，0xb6，0xf0，0x42，0xd4，0x81，0x72，0xa7，0x99}。The GUID value to use for the MD5 hash is {0x406ea660, 0x64cf, 0x4c82, 0xb6, 0xf0, 0x42, 0xd4, 0x81, 0x72, 0xa7, 0x99}. 用于 SHA1 哈希的 GUID 为 {0xff1816ec，0xaa5e，0x4d10，0x87，0xf7，0x6f，0x49，0x63，0x83，0x34 赋，0x60}。The GUID to use for the SHA1 hash is {0xff1816ec, 0xaa5e, 0x4d10, 0x87, 0xf7, 0x6f, 0x49, 0x63, 0x83, 0x34, 0x60}. 校验和的计算是特定于语言的。The calculation of the checksum is language-specific. 也就是说，语言供应商可以使用调试器已知的任何哈希算法来计算校验和。That is, the language vendor can use any of the hashing algorithms known to the debugger to calculate the checksum. 使用此属性的 GUID 提供哈希算法扩展性。The use of a GUID for this property provides hash algorithm extensibility. 由于 SHA1 和 MD5 发生冲突，Microsoft 建议使用基于 SHA256 或更好的安全模型。Due to collision problems with SHA1 and MD5, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性的设置。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值的示例为 "C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt"。An example of a property value is "C:\Temp\Test\OuterLinePragma.txt". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 属性的设置。The following code example shows the setting of the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/CS/codedirective.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.CodeDirectives/VB/codedirective.vb#5)]
